languages.text: "Мы оба убиваем по велению Неумирающего. Почему же ты так решительно отвергаешь наше сходство, Амик'Соломон?"
"We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"
languages.original_text: "Мы оба убиваем по велению Неумирающего. Почему же ты так решительно отвергаешь наше сходство, Амик'Соломон?"

traits.locale_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"
"We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"
"We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"
"We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"
"We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

languages.text: 「私たちはどちらも、不死の皇帝の御意に従って命を奪っている。なのに、なぜそこまで必死に、私たちの共通点を否定しようとするのだ？ソロモーンよ」
languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはどちらも、不死の皇帝の御意に従って命を奪っている。なのに、なぜそこまで必死に、私たちの共通点を否定しようとするのだ？ソロモーンよ」

languages.text: "Wir töten beide auf Geheiß des Todlosen Imperators. Warum bemüht Ihr Euch so verzweifelt, unsere Ähnlichkeiten zu leugnen, Amic'Solomorne?"
languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir töten beide auf Geheiß des Todlosen Imperators. Warum bemüht Ihr Euch so verzweifelt, unsere Ähnlichkeiten zu leugnen, Amic'Solomorne?"

languages.text: « Nous tuons tous les deux au nom de l'Empereur Immortel. Pourquoi vous obstinez-vous à nier nos similitudes, Amic'Solomorne ? »
languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous tuons tous les deux au nom de l'Empereur Immortel. Pourquoi vous obstinez-vous à nier nos similitudes, Amic'Solomorne ? »

languages.text: «Los dos matamos al servicio del Emperador Inmortal. ¿Por qué se muestra tan reacio a admitir nuestras similitudes, Amic'Solomorne?».
languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

traits.locale_text: «Los dos matamos al servicio del Emperador Inmortal. ¿Por qué se muestra tan reacio a admitir nuestras similitudes, Amic'Solomorne?».

languages.text: “我们都是遵从不死神皇的意愿进行杀戮。既然如此，你为什么如此强烈地否定我们的相似之处呢，信者索罗蒙？”
languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

traits.locale_text: “我们都是遵从不死神皇的意愿进行杀戮。既然如此，你为什么如此强烈地否定我们的相似之处呢，信者索罗蒙？”

languages.text: "İkimiz de Ölmeyen İmparator namına can alıyoruz. Neden benzediğimiz gerçeğini hazmedemiyorsun Amik'Solomorne?"
languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"

traits.locale_text: "İkimiz de Ölmeyen İmparator namına can alıyoruz. Neden benzediğimiz gerçeğini hazmedemiyorsun Amik Solomorne?"

languages.original_text: "We both kill at the behest of the Undying Emperor. Why are you so desperate to deny our similarities, Amic'Solomorne?"
